title: Summoner Name Server Transfer
body:
Hey there,

I was just wondering what would happen if I had a summoner name from Japan that was all in Japanese characters, and I transferred the account to NA. Would I keep my summoner name or would it make me change it even if no one in NA has the same name?

replies.body: NA currently doesn't allow special characters, per our [summoner name](https://www.google.com/search?q=summoner+name+special+characters&rlz=1C1NHXL_enUS727US727&oq=summoner+name+special+characters&aqs=chrome..69i57.2916j0j7&sourceid=chrome&ie=UTF-8) guide.  When I say it's not allowed, we literally aren't able to modify names ourselves either to have special characters.  Transferring to NA would require a name change for your specific issue. Let me know if that clears things up!

Hi! Would someone from RIOT staff be able to help me with this thread? #Missingleague
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/FGeAFZfg-my-account-got-hijacked-they-spend-200-on-my-card-for-rp-and-transferred-my-account-wtf
